casebody.data:
Thomasine CLOUDE and Ina Ruth Hunter, Petitioners, v. DEPARTMENT OF THE NAVY, Respondent. No. 01-3170. United States Court "of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: Dec. 10, 2001.

Before BRYSON, LINN, and DYK, Circuit Judges.

*959Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R.86
